caseFile.title: #1 Good Vs WeEVIL
caseFile.description: Emergency alert! All agents report! Following a disastrous experiment by Lab, a ghastly gas has cloaked the Binscape, creating mysterious mutated WeEvils!

caseFile.title: #2 Micro Mayhem
caseFile.description: Emergency alert! All agents report! There’s been a WEB break-in at Lab’s Lab and something very important has been stolen. We must investigate immediately!
